text:
The biggest journey is made of
individual steps
the first one is a big one
so is each step taking you further.

Fifteen years ago OpenCourseWare took
its first step

revolutionary idea from MIT faculty to
openly shared their teaching materials
from the MIT classrooms with the world

syllabi, notes, homework, assignments,
videos, and more
every year OpenCourseWare keeps growing

adding hundreds of new learning
resources to use at any time
for free

every year millions of people use
OpenCourseWare to enhance their

knowledge improve their lives and help
their communities

every year thousands of people tell us
how OpenCourseWare
has changed their lives for the better

the most important step is the one you
take today

help us continue this free and open
journey
today help us celebrate 15 years of open sharing

become one of 2001 supporters for this
crowd funding campaign your donation

will go farther because MathWorks will
match donations up to $100,000
we've come a long way and we're still moving step by step by step
thank you
